overview_of_class: This is a statistics class geared toward students interested in biology, ecology, or environmental science. The course is applied statistics with the goal of students being able to use the skills, experience, information, and software learned in class after class. We will use the software R for all quantitative methods practiced in class. R is a very flexible and powerful program that you can use for any statistical problem you encounter. The program is free, well-supported, well-documented, and is constantly getting better and more powerful.
name: Quantitative Methods for Ecology and Conservation
subject: BIOL_SCI
